SEARCH
Package model

Class Album

java.lang.Object
model.Album
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Album extends Object implements Serializable
Class to represent an album in the Photos application. An album has a name, a list of photos, and metadata including the date created and date last modified.
See Also:
